forum.content:
這可能是看過最kuso的電影吧! 居然一堆鯊魚在龍捲風裡面飛來飛去，還可以毀滅到整個美國
Shark(鯊魚)+ Tornado(龍捲風) = Sharknado
沒什麼劇情，反正就是鯊魚亂飛就對了!

urls.description: See SHARKNADO at a theater near you - ONE NIGHT ONLY! http://www.regmovies.com/promotions/sharknado
urls.title: SHARKNADO - Official Asylum Trailer - TOO VIOLENT FOR TV??

forum.title: 鯊魚龍捲風
